img_summary: The image shows a rectangular, wooden object with an engraved design of bamboo stalks and leaves. The wood appears aged and has a dark brown color with visible grain and texture. The engraving is simple and stylized, depicting a few bamboo shoots and leaves. The object is set against a dark background, highlighting its details.
